componentDescription: This component ensures its content maintains a specified aspect ratio, adjusting its size responsively while preserving visual proportions.

ratio.description: Set a default aspect ratio of 16:9 if no ratio is provided as a prop.

children.description: children prop used to render enclosed components.

views.description: An object to customize the props of the internal 'Center' and 'View' components, e.g., { center?: CenterProps, view?: ViewProps }.

props.description: Spread the rest of the props to inherit additional properties for the root 'Center' component from 'app-studio'.
